name: Ball Bouncer (sppmacd)
description:
Game for Mini Jam 86: Sports.

  • Click to place bouncers.
  • Bouncers give speed to ball.
  • Don't allow balls stop! You get more score for more time you keep all balls moving.
  • A new ball is spawned every 15 seconds.
  • There are red boxes spawning sometimes. They may give good or bad effects, this is a risk!

Software/technologies used: C++11, SFML, CMake, Gimp.
